column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " I 'm so sorry to interrupt , but more airships are coming . "
#Text=Ikki says : " Everything 's not gon na be fine , is it , Daddy ? "
#Text=Korra says : " What do you want to do , Tenzin ? "
#Text=Tenzin says : " I need to protect my family , and get them as far away from this conflict as possible .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " But - " Lin says : " No arguments .
#Text=You and your family are the last airbenders .
#Text=There 's no way in the world I 'm letting Amon take your bending away .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Thank you , Lin .
#Text=Korra , I want you to leave this island and hide for the time being .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm not giving up .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm not asking you to .
#Text=I sent word to the United Forces .
#Text=They will be here soon .
#Text=And once my family is safe , I will return .
#Text=With the reinforcements , we can turn the tide in this war .
#Text=" Korra says : " What you 're saying is , we need to be patient .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " You 're learning well .
#Text=Stay safe , Korra .
#Text=" Korra says : " You too .
#Text=" Lin says : " Tenzin , if we 're leaving , we 'd better do it now .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Oogi , yip yip !
#Text=" White Lotus sentry # 1 says : " Go !
#Text=We 'll hold them off !
#Text=" Korra says : " Everyone , climb on !
#Text=Let 's go , girl !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Mustache guy !
#Text=" Korra says : " Nice one , Naga !
#Text=" Lin says : " They 're gaining on us !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Faster , Oogi !
#Text=" Lin says : " Whatever happens to me , do n't turn back !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Lin , what are you doing ?!
#Text=" Meelo says : " That lady is my hero .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Yes , she is .
#Text=" Mako says : " Korra , we should get moving .
#Text=" Amon says : " Tell me where the Avatar is and I 'll let you keep your bending .
#Text=" Lin says : " I wo n't tell you anything , you monster .
#Text=" Amon says : " Very well .
#Text=" Messenger says : " General , I just received a wire from the Avatar .
#Text=She says Amon and his forces have gained control of the city .
#Text=How do you want to respond ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Tell her we will be arriving in three days ' time .
#Text=And that I look forward to winning back Republic City , together .
#Text=" Messenger says : " As you wish , General Iroh .

#Text=" Main Asami Sato Bolin Korra Lin Beifong Mako Naga Tenzin Antagonists Amon Equalists Hiroshi Sato Lieutenant says : " Minor Air Acolytes Air Acolyte woman Council page Fire Nation councilwoman Ikki Iroh Jinora Meelo Oogi Pema Rohan Pabu Saikhan White Lotus sentries " Shiro Shinobi says : " Zaheer infiltrated Zaofu and attempted to kidnap the Avatar .
#Text=After a harrowing battle , she was saved and discovered a shocking truth : Aiwei , Su 's trusted adviser , has been working with Zaheer .
#Text=This truth seer turned traitor managed to escape but Su tasks Team Avatar of tracking him down .
#Text=Now the hunted becomes the hunter as Korra searches for answers .
#Text="
